info.name: Hobbyistic Endpoints
info.description:
All endpoints contained in the Hobbyistic API Service are documented here. Please use this as a development reference to integrate applications with the API.

All fields shown in the response body/request body are available for use in the API. Required fields are noted in each endpoint description

request.description:
The Register Endpoint is used to register a user for Hobbyistic. This is required to obtain a JWT token from the Login endpoint.

**Required Fields:**

- name
- email
- password

response.name: Register OK Response
response.body:
{
    "_id": "63f2b7cd0864c55410ffd9f0",
    "name": "John Appleseed",
    "email": "7@7.com",
    "password": "$2a$10$78hHHNLnsXnG3HRo3vosve70Cir.F.IQdRBJws4td3BhGbKcU5EI.",
    "saltSecret": "$2a$10$78hHHNLnsXnG3HRo3vosve",
    "__v": 0
}

request.description:
The login endpoint is used to generate a JWT token for all future API requests.

**The JTW token returned from this endpoint must be passed in all future requests in the Authorization Header as a Bearer token, or else the request will be rejected by the API.**

**Required Fields:**

- email
- password

response.name: Login OK Response

request.description:
This endpoint is used to add a users hobby.

**Required Fields:**

- name
